text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Commission" means the State Commission on Hereditary and Congenital Disorders.

section.section: "Congenital disorder" means a significant structural or functional abnormality of the body that is present at birth.

"Congenital disorder" does not include a condition that results from:
An intrauterine infection; or
A birth injury.

text.section:
"Hereditary disorder" means any disorder that:
Is transmitted through the genetic material deoxyribonucleic acid (DNA); or
Arises through the improper processing of the information in the genetic material.
